name: Meatless Stuffed Mushrooms
author: Lizable
summary: I love stuffed mushrooms but not the calories that come with it. I always have veggies on hand and this turned out to be a hit with my family.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon oil, or more as needed
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Combine zucchini, carrots, water chestnuts, pine nuts, and garlic in a mixing bowl
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat
Add vegetable mixture and cook until slightly soft, 3 to 5 minutes
Remove from heat and return to the mixing bowl to cool
Add Parmesan cheese to the cooled vegetables; mix to combine
Fill each mushroom with a generous amount of vegetable mixture, sprinkle cayenne pepper on top, and place on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until mushrooms are tender, about 12 minutes
